imdb.title: Gugure! Kokkuri-san
imdb.plot: The original manga revolves around Kohina, a little girl who ends up summoning by a Kokkuri-san, a lower-ranking ghost in Japanese folklore. The Kokkuri-san she calls ends up being a white-haired handsome, young man. Although he h...

episodes.title: Doll Girl Meets Kokkuri-san!
episodes.plot: Kohina Ichimatsu's cup noodle filled days as a self-proclaimed doll come to halt when she decides to play Kokkuri-san. The fox ghost she summons plans on making a lot of unwanted changes in her life and doesn't plan on leaving anytime soon.

episodes.title: A Refreshing Smile Is the First Step to Being a Decent Person!
episodes.plot: Kokkuri-san starts helping Kohina make progress in leading a normal life but then Inugami shows disrupting the household even more. What could this strange and slightly confused ghost dog want from our little heroine?

episodes.title: Inugami, Stay! Go to Your House!
episodes.plot: Inugami is proving to be way more difficult to live with than Kohina and Kokkuri-san had initially thought. After an outing though, Kohina may have finally uncovered the secret to taming the out of control ghost dog.

episodes.title: The One on My Mind Is Into Sci-Fi!
episodes.plot: As if Inugami wasn't enough to deal with, now there's the tanuki ghost Shigaraki. Can Kokkuri-san protect Kohina from the misfortune the new ghost brings? And what about the issue of her having an interest in a 'boy' from her class?

episodes.title: The Flowers on the Desk Are a Message!
episodes.plot: Kohina can't seem to find peace and quiet anywhere she goes, including school. She now finds herself the victim of bullying and Kokkuri-san just can't seem to stay away.

episodes.title: Kohina, the Cyclops, and Shigaraki!
episodes.plot: Much to the dismay of Kokkuri-san, Kohina is now able to see spirits. What makes things worse is she refuses to listen to his warning and befriends one. Shigaraki agrees to keep her secret, but will he be able to for very long?
